overview: Imagine 14 incredibly gorgeous women in a multi-million dollar estate with no one else around ... except you. And all these beautiful creatures want to do all day is have sex with each other ... and you're the lucky one who gets to hold the camera. "Just You & Me" has solos, 2 ways, 3 ways, and anal. You name it, these hot and horny girls will do it ... and it's all just for you. They're looking at you, talking to you, FUCKING ... FOR YOU. It's like you're right there in the room with them. POV "Just You & Me" is like the best interactive you've ever watched ... without all the stupid questions and annoying button pushing. I mean really, who wants to be fucking around with all the buttons on their remote when they're trying to jerk off anyway. Now sit back, enjoy, and let the girls give you the private show of a lifetime.
title: Just You & Me
